## R packages

4/ [dmprocr](https://github.com/bcm-uga/dmprocr) (2017) P. Terzian, F. Chuffart, D. Jost & **M. Richard**. R package to perform differential methylation profiles clustering. 

3/ [penda](https://github.com/bcm-uga/penda) (2017) D. Jost & **M. Richard**. R package to calculate personalized differential analysis of omics data.  

2/ [facsticor](https://github.com/magrichard/facsticor) (2015) ) F. Chuffart, G. Yvert & **M. Richard**. R method to analyse flow cytometry single cell data during time course experiments.

1/ [h4decoder5](https://github.com/magrichard/h4decoder5) (2013) **M. Richard**. R package to generate error-correcting DNA barcodes.
